artist: Artist: Lucien Pissarro; Artist: after Camille Pissarro; Engraver: Esther Levy Pissarro; Author: Émile Moselly; Publisher: Le Livre Contemporain, Paris , Paris
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: Woodcut border to title page, 20 woodcut illustrations in colors by Lucien Pissarro engraved by Esther Pissarro, 10 pictorial initials by the same, 12 inserted full-page woodcuts in colors by Lucien Pissarro after Camille Pissarro.
provenance: Ruth and Bruce Dayton, Wayzata, Minn.; given to MIA, 1991.
title: The Maplewood Plough
